snippet: The USA Network believes that in order to stay competitive it has to branch out into new programming directions.
abstract: USA Network is exploring new programming directions, including situation comedies and reality shows; network's top programming executives acknowledge that in order to grow, and to maintain top position in a competitive cable environment, it is time to branch out.
lead_paragraph: The USA Network believes that in order to stay competitive it has to branch out into new programming directions.

headline.seo: USA Network to Explore Sitcoms and Reality Shows
headline.main: USA Network to Explore Sitcoms and Reality Shows
headline.print_headline: USA Network Strays From Script to Explore Sitcoms and Reality Shows
